title: Aigoo, Scarlet Andante

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Revive a player during the day for the stupidest reason ever. You may only use this ability once.
- Secretly remove a player from any factional chats they're in, and make it so they can no longer send or receive whispers from their faction members if they're part of an evil faction with a factional chat. You may only use this ability twice.
- Weaken another player at night. You may only use this ability twice. (see 1026. All its attributes apply.)
**Unsung Revolt** â€” Use an ability from any role Aigoo has made or any role mentioned in the role 1867: AccentAigoo. You may only do this once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the end of every night, the host gives you a full priority list of the order in which all players' abilities resolved that night, but not what those abilities were. Abilities that are the same priority are sorted by player order.
- Every time the host makes a host error, you are informed of exactly what happened. You may then gain one use of your choice of the following: a Basic attack, a Basic autovest, or a vote that counts as three.
- All players who visit you at night become Spirals. (see 229. All its attributes apply.)
- You may multitask.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Entertain the spectators. They choose whether or not you win.
